    • Method Detail

      • getFieldSchema

        public static Optional<Schema> getFieldSchema(Schema schema,
                                              String fieldLocation)
        Given a GenericRecord, this method will return the schema of the field specified by the path parameter. The fieldLocation parameter is an ordered string specifying the location of the nested field to retrieve. For example, field1.nestedField1 takes the the schema of the field "field1", and retrieves the schema "nestedField1" from it.
        Parameters:
        schema - is the record to retrieve the schema from
        fieldLocation - is the location of the field
        Returns:
        the schema of the field

      • getFieldValue

        public static Optional<Object> getFieldValue(GenericRecord record,
                                             String fieldLocation)
        Given a GenericRecord, this method will return the field specified by the path parameter. The fieldLocation parameter is an ordered string specifying the location of the nested field to retrieve. For example, field1.nestedField1 takes the the value of the field "field1", and retrieves the field "nestedField1" from it.
        Parameters:
        record - is the record to retrieve the field from
        fieldLocation - is the location of the field
        Returns:
        the value of the field

      • convertRecordSchema

        public static GenericRecord convertRecordSchema(GenericRecord record,
                                                Schema newSchema)
                                         throws IOException
        Change the schema of an Avro record.
        Parameters:
        record - The Avro record whose schema is to be changed.
        newSchema - The target schema. It must be compatible as reader schema with record.getSchema() as writer schema.
        Returns:
        a new Avro record with the new schema.
        Throws:
        IOException - if conversion failed.

      • recordToByteArray

        public static byte[] recordToByteArray(GenericRecord record)
                                throws IOException
        Convert a GenericRecord to a byte array.
        Throws:
        IOException

        public static Schema getSchemaFromDataFile(Path dataFile,
                                           FileSystem fs)
                                    throws IOException
        Get Avro schema from an Avro data file.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • parseSchemaFromFile

        public static Schema parseSchemaFromFile(Path filePath,
                                         FileSystem fs)
                                  throws IOException
        Parse Avro schema from a schema file.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • getDirectorySchema

        public static Schema getDirectorySchema(Path directory,
                                        Configuration conf,
                                        boolean latest)
                                 throws IOException
        Get the latest avro schema for a directory
        Parameters:
        directory - the input dir that contains avro files
        conf - configuration
        latest - true to return latest schema, false to return oldest schema
        Returns:
        the latest/oldest schema in the directory
        Throws:
        IOException

      • nullifyFieldsForSchemaMerge

        public static Schema nullifyFieldsForSchemaMerge(Schema oldSchema,
                                                 Schema newSchema)
        Merge oldSchema and newSchame. Set a field default value to null, if this field exists in the old schema but not in the new schema.
        Parameters:
        oldSchema -
        newSchema -
        Returns:
        schema that contains all the fields in both old and new schema.

      • removeUncomparableFields

        public static Optional<Schema> removeUncomparableFields(Schema schema)
        Remove map, array, enum fields, as well as union fields that contain map, array or enum, from an Avro schema. A schema with these fields cannot be used as Mapper key in a MapReduce job.

      • switchName

        public static Schema switchName(Schema schema,
                                String newName)
        Copies the input Schema but changes the schema name.
        Parameters:
        schema - Schema to copy.
        newName - name for the copied Schema.
        Returns:
        A Schema that is a copy of schema, but has the name newName.

      • serializeAsPath

        public static Path serializeAsPath(GenericRecord record,
                                   boolean includeFieldNames,
                                   boolean replacePathSeparators)
        Serialize a generic record as a relative Path. Useful for converting GenericRecord type keys into file system locations. For example {field1=v1, field2=v2} returns field1=v1/field2=v2 if includeFieldNames is true, or v1/v2 if it is false. Illegal HDFS tokens such as ':' and '\\' will be replaced with '_'. Additionally, parameter replacePathSeparators controls whether to replace path separators ('/') with '_'.
        Parameters:
        record - GenericRecord to serialize.
        includeFieldNames - If true, each token in the path will be of the form key=value, otherwise, only the value will be included.
        replacePathSeparators - If true, path separators ('/') in each token will be replaced with '_'.
        Returns:
        A relative path where each level is a field in the input record.
